Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: There's no need to hire more guards.
Oh, Percius Mercius agreed to garrison your stronghold?
Good. I will give the orders to begin the next phase of construction.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
SET fbmwHRStronghold.BuildProgress TO 2 ; Just in Case
SetStage fbmwHRStronghold 170

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Yes, speak with Percius Mercius at the local Guild of Fighters. They usually know of a few good Redoran fighters out of work.
If you have any trouble with your guards, let me know about it.
Oh? You were able to get Frelene Acques out? I will take you word for it. I'll have a few of our better fighters sent over to your stronghold.
I know a few men who can garrison your stronghold, and I'll even recommend them to you for free.
But first you'll have to get my friend, Frelene Acques out of prison.
She's being held in the prison under the Hlaalu Canton in Vivec. Find a way to get her out and report back to me.
You've already taken care of it.
Have you finished, or are you going to keep looking for colonists willing to act as guards?
Really? I've got to admit, this mining stuff isn't really for me. It's not that I mind hard work, but I'm just not enjoying it.
There's nothing to lose, right? Sure, I'll give it a try.
Oh, you're silly. Hee hee! Why would I ever do something like that? With all these big, strong men here, I'm sure they can take care of it.
Oh, no. I have Seler to look after. And I don't think I'm really suited for that sort of thing, do you?
Not over your dead body.
I'm an old man. I'd be of no use to you.
Ha ha! No.
You want me to guard this place? No, I don't think so. Sorry.
Good luck with that. I'm afraid you won't see me volunteering. I have enough to do, thank you very much.
I think it's only fair that others take up the responsibility, but it's not something I would be willing to order any of them to do.
I'd like to see if there are any volunteers first. Ask around, and see if any of the colonists would be interested. Let me know if you find any.
It's already been taken care of, from what I heard.
I've already accepted the opportunity, outlander.
So you're looking for volunteers? I've never been one to turn down an offer. It's gotten me this far, and maybe now I can go even farther.
Sure, I'll accept.
Yes, like I told you, I'll do it.
This is interesting news. I was just telling someone the other day that someone needs to make sure his place is safe.
Looks like I'll get a chance to put my money where my mouth is, eh? I'll do it.
I've already said I'll do it. What else do you want me to say?
That's Carnius' problem. Not mine.
It's already been addressed. Any more guards hired now, and it'll just mean that much more carnage in the long run.
Well, have you found anyone to take up the positions?

Personally, I couldn't care if they all dropped dead tomorrow. But the investors are becoming nervous, and I'm not quite ready for them to pull out of the venture just yet. So you're going to poll the colonists and see if any are willing to volunteer.
It'll look better that way, don't you think? Return to me when you've found some willing to take the job.
